title.text: Strong support among teens for gun policy proposals focused on mental illness % of teens saying each of the following would be__ at preventing school shootings

values: Preventing people with mental illnesses from purchasing guns
Improving mental health screening and treatment
Allowing teachers and school officials to carry guns in schools

models.name: Very effective
x: Preventing people with mental illnesses from purchasing guns
Improving mental health screening and treatment
Allowing teachers and school officials to carry guns in schools

models.name: Somewhat effective

Improving mental health screening and treatment
Allowing teachers and school officials to carry guns in schools

models.name: NET
x: Preventing people with mental illnesses from purchasing guns

Allowing teachers and school officials to carry guns in schools
